name: @wistrand/melker
description: A Deno library for creating rich Terminal UI interfaces with flexbox-based layouts

tasks.build: deno task build:assets && deno task build:completions && deno task build:skill && deno task build:docs && deno task build:lock
tasks.build:skill: cd skills/creating-melker-apps && zip -r ../../docs/skill-creating-melker-apps.zip SKILL.md references/ && echo 'Created skill-creating-melker-apps.zip'
tasks.build:docs: rm -rf docs/examples/showcase && cp -r examples/showcase docs/examples/showcase && echo 'Copied examples/showcase â†’ docs/examples/showcase'
tasks.build:lock: rm -f deno.lock && deno cache melker.ts src/melker-runner.ts && echo 'Regenerated deno.lock (runtime deps only)'
tasks.publish:dry-run: cp README.md README.md.bak && cp docs/README-jsr.md README.md && deno publish --dry-run --allow-dirty; mv README.md.bak README.md
tasks.publish: cp README.md README.md.bak && cp docs/README-jsr.md README.md && deno publish; mv README.md.bak README.md
